short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is developed by smart techi

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for entertainment for people now a days working from home and are getting bored. To have some relief they can use my extension as application to upload their desktop music files and relax in tea breaks. 

This is extension 1.1 updated. 

Changes made:
--------------------------

- Previously not supporting full screen. Now, we are supporting. 
- In mobile view also looks.

Still we will add new features in upcoming enhancements.
